name: Happy Hill Climb Wheels Race
description:
Now you can play the best physics-based racing game out there for free!

The game is divided into four different racing disciplines. Drive your car and beat your opponent.

Drive through all kinds levels filled with hills to climb and obstacles to dodge! But be careful not to overturn your ride or it might just go up in flames!

Unlock new cars and new tracks. With a good car you can be 50% sure that you will be successful. The rest is all about your skills and abilities.

Enjoy it.
